p:
The bias toward transitions—mainly A>G/T>C changes—resembles the pattern of SNVs observed in human transcriptomes (
42 ) or in viruses (
8 ,
10 ,
18 ), where A>G changes derive from deamination of A-to-I mediated by the ADARs. It is thus likely that the A>G/T>C changes seen in SARS-CoV-2 are also due to the action of ADARs.
